events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of April 10th and filed a claim for vehicle damages and personal injury.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after confirmation that the incident involved a vehicle collision on a public road.
An insurance agent specializing in auto accidents was assigned to handle the customer's claim and provide assistance throughout the process.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and assuring timely processing and support during investigation.
Request for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and medical reports was sent to the customer to proceed with detailed claim investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including the police report, vehicle repair estimate, and medical bills for injuries sustained.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documentation and contacting involved parties to verify accident details and liability.
Investigation concluded confirming the other driver was at fault, and vehicle damage along with medical expenses are covered under the policy.
Settlement offer was proposed detailing the repair costs and reimbursement for medical treatment in accordance with the insurance policy terms.
Customer responded positively expressing satisfaction with the communication and clarity of the proposed settlement offer.
Claim approval was granted after final review, confirming coverage for vehicle repairs and medical expenses as per policy limits.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued promptly to the customer to cover vehicle repairs and medical bills.
The claim was officially closed after all payments were made and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the outcome.
All relevant case files and documentation were archived for record-keeping and future reference following claim closure.
